column4: Hello all, I have an issue that I hope is an easy fix. I have a Brother Printer (HL-2270dw), that I need to install on ubuntu 11.04 64 bit. I have it running fine on an 10.04 32 bit. But it won't setup on this machine. Any assistance would be appreciated.
you need to find a driver that's compatible to Linux
Brother has a linux driver both lpr and cups, however they are 32bit drivers.
